instructions:
Mix barbecue sauce, brown sugar and onion.
Place salmon on greased grill over medium-hot coals.
Grill 4 minutes on each side. Brush generously with barbecue sauce mixture. Grill an additional 2 to 4 minutes or until salmon flakes easily with fork, turning once and brushing with remaining barbecue sauce mixture.
ingredients: 1/2 cup KRAFT THICK 'N SPICY Original Barbecue Sauce
title: BBQ Salmon
